title: Impact of corporate earnings reports on Codorus Valley Bancorp Inc stock's price movements

content.text: On July 22, 2021, Codorus Valley Bancorp Inc released their Q2 2021 earnings report. The company reported a net income of $5.3 million, reflecting an increase of 34% compared to the same period last year. This positive earnings report had a significant impact on the stock's price movement. Immediately after the report's release, the stock price surged by 8%, indicating strong investor sentiment and confidence in the company's financial performance.

Another relevant example is the Q3 2021 earnings report, which was released on October 21, 2021. Codorus Valley Bancorp Inc reported net income of $4.8 million, representing a slight decrease compared to the previous quarter. This earnings report had a mixed impact on the stock price. Initially, the stock price dropped by 4% as investors had expected higher earnings. However, after further analysis of the report's details, it was revealed that the decrease in net income was primarily due to one-time expenses, which reassured investors. As a result, the stock price recovered and ended the day with a 2% increase.

The most recent earnings report released on January 20, 2022, was the Q4 2021 earnings report. Codorus Valley Bancorp Inc reported net income of $6.1 million, surpassing market expectations by 10%. This exceptional performance had a significant positive impact on the stock's price movement. The stock price immediately jumped by 12% after the report's release, indicating strong investor enthusiasm and confidence in the company's ability to generate substantial profits.
